Needing help?

  • Enter your query in the input field. Make sure that attributes mentioned in the query are existent in the listed attributes underneath the input field

  • (Optional) Select attributes. Each GBD-Hash which matches your query is resolved against these attributes. This affects the values shown in the table and given in the csv file ("Download attributes")

  • Press the enter button or press the search button right next to the input field to populate the table with your results.

  • You can download the result of the query as csv file or get a list of URLs for the instances to download them
